Uses of Class
com.ibm.streams.management.security.Permissions

Packages that use Permissions
Package
Description
com.ibm.streams.management.security
The com.ibm.streams.management.security package contains classes and interfaces for accessing and managing permissions to Streams secured objects for user, group, and role security principals.

  • Uses of Permissions in com.ibm.streams.management.security

    Methods in com.ibm.streams.management.security that return Permissions
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Permissions
    PrincipalMXBean.getPermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
    Returns the permissions set for the principal, at a specified scope, to a secured object.
    Permissions
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.getPermissions(String securedObject, String principal, PrincipalMXBean.Type principalType, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
    Returns the permissions set for a principal, at a specified scope, to a secured object.
    Methods in com.ibm.streams.management.security that return types with arguments of type Permissions
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<String,Permissions>
    PrincipalMXBean.getDefaultPermissions()
    Returns the default permissions used for new child objects set specifically for the principal.
    Map<String,Permissions>
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.getGroupPermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
    Returns the set of group names for which permissions have been granted to a secured object at a specified scope.
    Map<String,Permissions>
    PrincipalMXBean.getPermissions()
    Returns the permissions set specifically for the principal.
    Map<String,Permissions>
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.getResolvedPermissions(String user)
    Returns all secured objects and the permissions the specified user has to them either by permission being granted to the user, a group to which the user belongs, or a role which the user has.
    Map<String,Permissions>
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.getRolePermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
    Returns the set of role names for which permissions have been granted to a secured object at a specified scope.
    Map<String,Permissions>
    SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.getUserPermissions(String securedObject, SecuredObjectManagerMXBean.PermissionScope scope)
    Returns the set of user names for which permissions have been granted to a secured object at a specified scope.
